content: the photo of this belt is shown in my book positively crochet on the model along with the pink newsboy cap a matching set but the pattern did not get put in the book my publisher asked me to put the instructions for the pattern on my website please click on the link to find the free pattern this is a quick and easy pattern for a beginner pattern is here 1 for free 1 http //positivelycrochet blogspot ca/2011/02/free-crochet-pattern-circles-belt html
